fullText: Cooper brings a fierce physicality to the role, contorting his body into the twisted shape of John Merrick with disturbing conviction. His performance is both technically impressive and emotionally affecting.

bwwExcerpt: As Peter Pan is traditionally portrayed by a gamine actress, and Hairspray's Edna Turnblad by a chunky actor, theatrical tradition dictates that John Merrick, the grotesquely deformed title character of Bernard Pomerance's The Elephant Man, be embodied by an extremely handsome, seminude star eager t...
